It was me who started the Minion Attak there, just for fun. I havent a spec=
ific plan there but I'm thiniking in a couple of them.

From: Super Cyclonu=
s 
Sent: Tuesday, February 09, 2010 11:31 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Su=
bject: Re: OOC: Predacons a nother chars


  

Okay :)

If someone has not =
played a large role in the plot, there is certainly no reason to bring them=
 in I would think. My thought would be to tighten up the number of characte=
rs that we are individually playing so that no one gets overwhelmed and bur=
nt out and yet we can keep things running smoothly. 

Airly is discussing a=
 plot idea with me which sounds pretty cool. So my questions are to Kraftlo=
s and Sandy: Is there anything either of you need from any of my characters=
 to keep yours moving? I am about to post for the minions soon, but is ther=
e anything you need from that side?  

I am not sure who started the minion=
 attack, it looks like Airly but I am not completely sure. The question is:=
 Was there a specific reason or goal in mind as to why attacking the Old Ma=
ximal Base? I don't want to ruin anyone's plans or goals. 

Preston

ue, February 9, 2010 7:55:38 AM

 know how that would affect anything.   I think the maxmials have become on=
e group again, but I don't know where Lord Rasorwing is (he hasn't really p=
layed a big role in the plot).
